name: Shroomery Lighter Default Theme
description: This theme puts dark text on a light background, and includes new features.
additional_info:
* Turn off limit width of images in prefs - http://www.shroomery.org/forums/editdisplay.php?Cat= - at the very bottom of the page. Set the value to "0".
* Large images in threads will now scale automatically to the width of the thread.
* Click and hold on a scaled down image to view it fullscreen. (not yet working in Chrome)
* Ellipsis "..." indicate you can hover for more on post titles, post extras, and blockquotes.
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document domain("www.shroomery.org"){.lighttable,.darktable,.cleartable,.subjecttable,.threadtotal,.posttotal,.posttime,.newlighttable,.newdarktable,.newsubjecttable { background:none !important}.location+br+.tablesurround .menubar{ background:rgb(132,221,255) !important; background:-moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,131,175,1) 0%,rgba(0,79,106,1) 100%) !important; background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,left bottom,color-stop(0%,rgba(0,79,106,1)),color-stop(100%,rgba(132,221,255,1)) ) !important; background:-webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,131,175,1) 0%,rgba(0,79,106,1) 100%) !important; background:-o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,131,175,1) 0%,rgba(0,79,106,1) 100%) !important; background:-ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0,131,175,1) 0%,rgba(0,79,106,1) 100%) !important;
